title: Jul 2025 Balance Dataslate
description: All July 2025 balance dataslate updates have been applied.

title: Fixes
description: Add universal equipment + lots of fixes throughout including Killteam composition, missing or incorrect weapon rules, and others.

title: Killteam Page Updates, auto-apply mods
description: Added killteam composition, equipment, and ploys to the killteam pages. Added support for mods on weapons and operatives (e.g. Mark of Chaos or Custom Bolt Carbine).
